type i32

private fun x(): i32 = 1
private fun x(a: i32): i32 = 1

fun test(): i32 = x(1.0)

---
Type phase failed. 4 errors found:
  1)  Could not find a valid overload for function of type fun() -> i32 & fun(a: i32) -> i32 with the arguments of type (f32)
  2)  Cannot infer return type
  3)  Type mismatch: Type "fun(a: i32) -> i32" is not assignable to "i32"
  4)  Type mismatch: Type "fun() -> i32" is not assignable to "i32"
